casebody.data:
Jane Constance SHERMAN
v.
HOME DEPOT USA, INC. No. 570P03. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 5, 2004. John F. Morris, Brian E. Guy, Charlotte, for Unnamed Defendant Companion Property and Casualty Insurance. Guy W. Crabtree, Richard N. Watson, Durham, for Sherman. Prior report: 160 N.CApp. 404 , 588 S.E.2d 478 .

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 21st day of October 2003 by Unnamed Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th day of February 2004."
